name: Docker Mailserver
description: Full-featured mail server (SMTP, IMAP, POP3, antispam, antivirus)

commands.run: docker run -d --name mailserver --network {{networkName}} -p 25:25 -p 143:143 -p 587:587 -p 993:993 -v ~/wsdata/mailserver/data:/var/mail -v ~/wsdata/mailserver/state:/var/mail-state -v ~/wsdata/mailserver/logs:/var/log/mail -v ~/wsdata/mailserver/config:/tmp/docker-mailserver -e ENABLE_SPAMASSASSIN=1 -e ENABLE_CLAMAV=1 -e ENABLE_FAIL2BAN=1 --hostname mail.{{domain}} --restart unless-stopped docker.io/mailserver/docker-mailserver:latest
